title: Gold IV ADC left and searching a searious ranked team!
body:
Hi guys,

I'm 15 years old and from germany, i am a no rage/flame guy 
I speak fluently english and got Ts3 and skype for comnunication 
My main role is ADC.
I mainly play vayne but i am also ok with ezreal, caitlyn jinx etc. at least with nearly all ADC'S
my support pref is braum thresh janna or leona but if you can play other supports i'm ok with it 2 ;D
i got a huge champion pool, in which is every champ, that means i can trade with your as much as you want.
I would be every day available to play with you but monday, wednesday and thursday only from 20 o'clock at german time
if you are interested to play with me in your team add me please IG : MouRED RMT Tobi

PS: if you haven't got an Ts3 server i would have one which we could use
